      Subclasses of Message in to.sven.androidrccar.common.communication.model 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AdjustSpeedMessage
      Message is send to Host: Adjust the speed of the car.
      class  AuthenticationFailedMessage
      Message is send to the client, if the authentication failed.
      class  AuthenticationMessage
      This message try to authenticate the Client on the Host.
      class  BatteryPowerMessage
      This Message contains information about the battery charging level of the car.
      class  CameraConnectionParameterMessage
      This message contains the parameters for the access to the camera stream.
      class  FeatureMessage
      This Message is send to the Client after authentication.
      class  GreetingMessage
      First Message.
      class  LocationMessage
      This Message contains information about the location of the car.
      class  RequestCameraMessage
      This Message advises the Host that the Client want to get the camera stream.
      class  RotateCameraMessage
      Rotate the camera (if supported).
      class  SetUpCyclicUpdateMessage
      Message is send to the host.
      class  TurnCarMessage
      Message is send to Host: Change the direction of the car or better change the rotation of the "steering wheel".
